original_title: The 7 waves of Imouran (sat tidangiwin n imuran)
overview: The movie is an adaptation of the legend of the seven waves of Imuran. Tafukt relates the story of a village girl from Imuran. To get married in the year, she has to go inside the abyss of Imuran to be purified by the seven waves.
title: The 7 waves of Imouran (sat tidangiwin n imuran)
